title: Quick launch shortcut
body: It would be great option to let shell be Quake-style - to have it launched on start and quickly toggled by hotkey. Idea is inspired by Terra Terminal and Guake for *nix

comments.body: I know this request is 4 years old now, but with the new Windows Terminal app, this would be pretty nice to have on a default terminal. I use ConEmu on Windows and iTerm mainly for this functionality.
